article.title: Raytheon Recieves $42 Million FLIR Production Kit Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Technical Services Company, Indianapolis, Indiana, was awarded a $42 million contract to provide 65 AN/AAQ 29A forward looking infrared production kits and 15 initial spares in support of the HH-60G helicopter. Â Warner Robins Air Logistics Center, Robins Air Force Base, Georgia, is the contracting activity.
